description: Enables you to include or exclude one or more operational recommendations.

parameters.name: appArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

parameters.name: requestEntries
parameters.description: Defines the list of operational recommendations that need to be included or excluded. (dict) --- Defines the operational recommendation item that is to be included or excluded. appComponentId (string) --- Indicates the identifier of the AppComponent. An identifier for an entry in this batch that is used to communicate the result. excludeReason (string) --- Indicates the reason for excluding an operational recommendation. Indicates if the operational recommendation needs to be excluded. If set to True, the operational recommendation will be excluded. item (dict) --- The operational recommendation item. resourceId (string) --- Resource identifier of the operational recommendation item. targetAccountId (string) --- Identifier of the target Amazon Web Services account. targetRegion (string) --- Identifier of the target Amazon Web Services Region. Reference identifier of the operational recommendation item.

nested_params.name: appComponentId
nested_params.description: Indicates the identifier of the AppComponent.

nested_params.name: entryId
nested_params.description: An identifier for an entry in this batch that is used to communicate the result.

nested_params.name: excludeReason
nested_params.description: Indicates the reason for excluding an operational recommendation.

nested_params.name: excluded
nested_params.description: Indicates if the operational recommendation needs to be excluded. If set to True, the operational recommendation will be excluded.

nested_params.name: resourceId
nested_params.description: Resource identifier of the operational recommendation item.

nested_params.name: targetAccountId
nested_params.description: Identifier of the target Amazon Web Services account.

nested_params.name: targetRegion
nested_params.description: Identifier of the target Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_params.name: referenceId
nested_params.description: Reference identifier of the operational recommendation item.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: failedEntries
nested_items.description: A list of items with error details about each item, which could not be included or excluded.

nested_items.name: entryId
nested_items.description: An identifier of an entry in this batch that is used to communicate the result.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: Indicates the error that occurred while excluding an operational recommendation.

nested_items.name: successfulEntries
nested_items.description: A list of items that were included or excluded.

nested_items.name: appComponentId
nested_items.description: Indicates the identifier of an AppComponent.

nested_items.name: entryId
nested_items.description: An identifier for an entry in this batch that is used to communicate the result.

nested_items.name: excludeReason
nested_items.description: Indicates the reason for excluding an operational recommendation.

nested_items.name: excluded
nested_items.description: Indicates if the operational recommendation was successfully excluded.

nested_items.name: resourceId
nested_items.description: Resource identifier of the operational recommendation item.

nested_items.name: targetAccountId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the target Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: targetRegion
nested_items.description: Identifier of the target Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: referenceId
nested_items.description: Reference identifier of the operational recommendation.
